name: 1. Name should be in lowercase.
2. Name should be one word.
3. Name should describe repository's purpose
branch: 1. Learning - Should contain source information and course name seperated by hyphons. Example: learning/example-course OR learning/example-course(type)

course.tips: Should be mentioned under reule repository and inside relevant git branch. Example: Repository name 'reule' banch name 'css'
course.exercise: Should be maintained under its own git repository and inside relevant git branch. Example: For CSS, repository name 'css' and branch name 'learning/introduction-to-css'
